description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites can release a dense liquid sealant that douses flames and seals open wounds. While your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.QoCQEVNtgMhsElwQ]{sheath array} is active you gain a +2 bonus to Medicine checks made to end the bleeding condition and Reflex saves made to end the burning condition. When you fail a check to end the bleeding or burning condition, you can use a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{nanite surge} as a reaction to reroll the failed check or saving throw.

modifiers.name: Neutralizing Nanites (Ex)
modifiers.notes: While your sheath array is active you gain a +2 bonus to Medicine checks made to end the bleeding condition and Reflex saves made to end the burning condition. When you fail a check to end the bleeding or burning condition, you can use a nanite surge as a reaction to reroll the failed check or saving throw.
